attributes.action: Raising Awareness of Pick's Disease ( A Rare Form of Dementia )
attributes.additional_details:
Pick's Disease is a Rare Form of Dementia. This Can Affect Both Men & Women and usually starts in the 40's, 50's or 60's. This is Caused By Loss of Brain Cells In The Frontal & Temporal Lobes of The Brain.


We The Under Signed Call On The Minister Of Health To Help Raise Awareness of Vulnerability of People Diagnosed With Pick's Disease
